feat.value: And on another occasion, another need compelled him,
he prayed and he crossed the river which is called “that of the golden one, the pomegranate”
walking on his foot until he went up to its bank.
And I, I was amazed (and) I prostrated myself before him:
“How is it that you feel your feet while you walk upon the water?”
He said, that is the old man:
“I feel that the water comes up to the ankles of my foot, but the bottom is firm.”
